str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
Pity, mercy, compassion. Of uncertain affinity; compassion.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To condemn, pass sentence upon. From kata and a derivative of dike; to adjudge against, i.e. Pronounce guilty.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
